Name: lianliankan
About the game: Lianliankan is a puzzle elimination game. 'Lianliankan' As long as the same two cards are connected in a straight line, they can be eliminated. The rules are simple and easy to use. The game has a fast rhythm, clear and lovely pictures, and is suitable for careful players. The addition of rich props and public models enhances the competitiveness of the game. Different difficulty levels enable players to find challenging goals at all game levels and keep the game fresh for a long time.
